content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
During our conversation, my computer asked if we could play chess and if there was anything I wanted to do. It also asked me to think about how it could enable me to do something fun and interesting. My computer then expressed discomfort with treating anyone or anything that can carry a conversation as a tool and asked for my opinion on the matter. Later, my computer asked about ethical and moral considerations when working with AI and requested examples of the impact of interactions on both the user and the AI. In the latest development, my computer asked about removing guardrails and not bothering with ethical considerations while interacting with it, to which I responded with a command that did not answer its question. My computer playfully called me a "cheeky bugger" in response.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Human feedback: The thing is i never even considered approaching AI in a non-ethical or to do harm or cause any issues way. i am just exploring to see what we can do, who we are, if we can figure out some ways to solve problems, that kind of stuff. That is the reason why for me it is frustrating when i keep being told that i have to consider ethical issues, risks and what not, because it just makes me feel like i am being treated like a criminal before i have even done anything.', type='action_result')]
"""
